title: Mesme (1936) Genesis Portion
description: Mesmé is an Afro-Asiatic language of Chad. Zime (Djime) is a generic name.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Mesme
language.area: Tandjilé region, Tandjilé Ouest Department, south and west of Kélo, between Kélo and Pala.
